mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vpp.virtual_power_plant (mobile_tel, user_name, language, user_id, country_name, user_account, user_master_org_name, email, country_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{mobileTel}, #{userName}, #{language}, #{userId}, #{countryName}, #{userAccount}, #{userMasterOrgName}, #{email}, #{countryId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mobile_tel = VALUES(mobile_tel), user_name = VALUES(user_name), language = VALUES(language), country_name = VALUES(country_name), user_master_org_name = VALUES(user_master_org_name), email = VALUES(email), country_id = VALUES(country_id), updated_at = VALUES(updated_at)
